skills.skill: Salesforce Field Service and/or Service Cloud hands-on Configuration

duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement new and enhance existing functionality including articulating requirements and translating them to effective solutions on SFDC (Salesforce.com) and related applications.
Engage with the existing SFDC Center of Excellence to represent projects and enhancements that affect the Service Organization.
Work with existing SFDC Architects to implement SFDC Service functionality.
Interface on a day-to-day basis with other analysts, business users, super users, and Information Technology (IT) team members to support business operations and drive change management.
Perform configuration/system changes to meet business requirements as needed.
Ensure the proper level of testing and documentation is completed for all work.
Lead cross-functional meetings as part of requirements gathering, driving projects, or providing status updates on various projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Systems, Information Technology, or related field (Master’s preferred)
